title: Resources in Swift Package Manager
text:
The Swift Package Manager is a great tool to wrap up code and help compartmentalize some of your data. It is still evolving but is really powerful. I ran into a few issues when trying to figure out how to add image resources to a package.
Here are the ways that I used to figure this out.

title: Resources in Swift Package Manager
text:
Still Not Working
OK, so this is still not working. I didnâ€™t get the error when compiling and testing on MacOS target, but I do when compiling for iOS. Apparetly, the best way to do it is to specify the items in the Resources directly explicitly.
The following does actually work!
        .target(
            name: "DLab",
            dependencies: [],
            resources: [
                .copy("Resources/tree.png")
            ]
        ),
Now it does work. And if you need to have additional items, they need to go into their own .copy() framework.

title: dyerlab
text: The Dyer laboratory is a research lab at Virginia Commonwealth University that focuses on developing and testing tools to aid in understand how landscape features influence genetic connectivity. This requires a mix of theory development, software creation, and evaluation using (largely) non-model systems in the field.

title: Rodney J. Dyer
text:
Rodney Dyer is currently serving as the Director of the Center for Environmental Studies at Virginia Commonwealth University.
His research laboratory focuses on developing tools to better understand how the physical configuration of natural and modified landscapes impact genetic connectivity for native and introduced species.

title: Rodney J. Dyer
text:
Education
2002 - PhD Biology - University of Missouri Saint Louis
1998 - MS Biology - University of Missouri Saint Louis
1996 - BS Biology - Western Washington University
1994 - AA General - Seattle Central Community College

title: Rodney J. Dyer
text:
Professional Experience
2017 - Present: Full Professor, VCU
2017 - Present: Director, CES
2017 - 2018: Interim Director, CSBC
2010 - 2017: Associate Professor, VCU
2004 - 2010: Assistant Professor, VCU
2002 - 2004: Postdoctoral Researcher, ISU
1995 - 1995: Howard Hughes Research Fellow, UW
